verbs.description: [ARG0: The DNC] [V: announced] [ARG1: a far - reaching lawsuit against the Trump campaign , Russia and Wikileaks] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-PRD: alleging a conspiracy during the 2016 presidential election] .
The DNC announced a [ARGM-EXT: far] - [V: reaching] [ARG1: lawsuit] against the Trump campaign , Russia and Wikileaks on Friday , alleging a conspiracy during the 2016 presidential election .
